text:
My life's purpose is to be
happy and live without regrets.

I want to be happy
with my career,

happy with how I've
helped my colleagues

and co-workers, happy with my
work's impact on the world.

I want to be happy
with my family life.

I want to have a house with a
white picket fence, a couple

kids, a dog, and
most importantly, I

want to be home every day
to spend time with them.

And at the end of
my life, I want

to know that I don't have
any regrets about wasting

time in a career I didn't love
or that didn't benefit society.

I don't want to regret that I
spent more time in the office

than I did with my
family and loved ones.

And ultimately, I don't
want to regret that I could
have done more with my life.
